div.div: End user guide for calculator app
Chapter . Sum Up
What is the addition of numbers
In this section, you will learn about the concept of addition.
How to add numbers
Here you will find the instructions to perform addition on the Calculator app.
Chapter . Subtract
What is the subtraction of numbers
In this section, you will learn about the concept of subtraction.
How to subtract numbers
Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.
Chapter . Multiply
What is the multiplication of numbers
In this section, you will learn about the concept of multiplication.
How to multiply numbers
Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.
Chapter . Divide
What is the division of numbers
In this section, you will learn about the concept of division.
How to divide numbers
Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h2.span: What is the addition of numbers

div.p: In this section, you will learn about the concept of addition.

To successfully perform the task of adding the numbers, you must know what is addition. The term "Addition" represents a mathematical operation. Addition is a process, an action that you perform using numbers. Addition allows you to find the sum of the numbers.
You use the (+) sign to perform the operation in the app.
Addition is the arithematic operation to produce a sum of two or more numbers.
Here you will find the instructions to perform addition on the Calculator app.
div.section: To successfully perform addition operation, you must know about the concept of addition.
The addition result is displayed on the screen.

You want to add 2 and 5. The equation will look like 2+5=7. You enter 2. Press (+). Enter 5. Press (=)
The result 7 appears on the screen.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h2.span: What is the subtraction of numbers

div.p: In this section, you will learn about the concept of subtraction.

To successfully perform the task of subtracting the numbers, you must know what is subtraction. The term "subtraction" represents a mathematical operation. Subtraction is a process, an action perform using numbers. Subtraction allows you to find the difference of the numbers.
You use the (-) sign to perform the operation in the app.
Subtraction is the arithematic operation to calculate difference of two or more numbers.
Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.
div.section: To successfully perform subtraction operation, you must know about the concept of subtraction.
The subtraction result is displayed on the screen.

You want to subtract 2 from 5. The equation will look like 5-2=3. You enter 5. Press (-). Enter 2. Press (=)
The result 3 appears on the screen.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h2.span: What is the multiplication of numbers

div.p: In this section, you will learn about the concept of multiplication.

To successfully perform the task of multiplying the numbers, you must know what is Multiplication. The term "multiplication" represents a mathematical operation. Multiplication is a process, an action perform using numbers.
Multiplication can be thought of as repeated addition. But it helps you to find the result faster.
Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.
div.section: To successfully perform subtraction operation, you must know about the concept of subtraction.
The multiplication result is displayed on the screen.

You want to multiply 2 and 5. The equation will look like 5x2=10. You enter 5. Press (x). Enter 2. Press (=)
The result 10 appears on the screen.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h2.span: What is the division of numbers

div.p: In this section, you will learn about the concept of division.

To successfully perform the task of dividing the numbers, you must know what is division. The term "division" represents a mathematical operation. Division is a process, an action perform using numbers. Division allows you to distribute numbers in equal parts.
Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.
div.section: To successfully perform division operation, you must know about the concept of division.

The division result is displayed on the screen.
You want to divide two numbers 4 and 2. The equation will look like 4/2=2. You enter 4. Press (/). Enter 2. Press (=) The result 2 appears on the screen.
